head.title: Paid Notice: Memorials LEVY, SENATOR NORMAN J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Memorials LEVY, SENATOR NORMAN J.

block.p: LEVY--Senator Norman J. 02/07/98. Sixth anniversary in heaven. To my beloved Norman: On the anniversary of your departure, you are always remembered and forever in my thoughts, and in my heart. Your legacy is being fulfilled and preserved through all who loved and respected you. I miss you and will love you forever. Love, Jo

Your legacy is being fulfilled and preserved through all who loved and respected you. I miss you and will love you forever. Love, Jo
